headline: J.B. Hunt (JBHT) Valuation Check After New $1.7 Billion Credit Agreement and $1 Billion Buyback Plan
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services (JBHT) just lined up a fresh $1.7 billion amended credit agreement and a $1 billion buyback plan, moves that quietly reshape the risk reward profile for existing shareholders. See our latest analysis for J.B. Hunt Transport Services. The market seems to have noticed, with a roughly 31 percent 3 month share price return and the stock now trading around $188.41. The 5 year total shareholder return of about 42 percent points to steady, not explosive, compounding,...
